thread.section_title: New York Marriott East Side - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Pretty Good
thread.title_full: Pretty Good - Review of New York Marriott East Side, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Dennis K
title: Pretty Good
text:
The Hotel and Rooms feel a little bit tired but the beds are very nice and apart from a reading light and a drawer everything seemed to work properly.
Our room was on 49th street and that can be a noisy, but nothing compared to the aircon which makes a lot of noise! It works, but I could not imagine having it switched on during the night (at least not without earplugs). Staff is good, not all smiles, but very efficient. Late checkout was arranged in less than a minute. Location in Midtown is great! I would stay here again, although the aircon needs work.
Room Tip: My room was on the 6th floor, 49th street and that was quite noisy (did not bother me though) See more room tips
